Headline: Loop-bound Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Belmont.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
